
---
title: 'TP-LINK 推出新款纸片路由：AX6000 规格，售价 529 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/cc2db0f3-5bc3-486e-b2b0-aa628a5231bb.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Mon, 01 Aug 2022 13:35:55 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/cc2db0f3-5bc3-486e-b2b0-aa628a5231bb.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="b1a9"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 8 月 1 日消息，TP-LINK 在推出 AX3000 和 AX5400 规格的纸片路由后，现又推出了最新的 AX6000 规格，售价 529 元。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="90be"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/cc2db0f3-5bc3-486e-b2b0-aa628a5231bb.png" w="1036" h="652" title="TP-LINK 推出新款纸片路由：AX6000 规格，售价 529 元" width="1036" height="516" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="15cc"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/4e4a0fcf-071e-4c9c-9691-39c1097c2250.png" w="1102" h="822" title="TP-LINK 推出新款纸片路由：AX6000 规格，售价 529 元" width="1102" height="612" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="dce8">IT之家了解到，纸片路由需要搭配易展路由器使用。参数方面，<strong>新款 AX6000 版本升级至双频 8 流</strong>，支持新一代 Wi-Fi 6 标准，支持 160MHz，带机量高达 512 台。<strong>2.4 和 5GHz 都支持 4x4 MIMO Wi-Fi</strong>，5GHz 天线增益可达 6dBi，既能增强设备上网信号，又能和易展路由建立更高的无线回传带宽。</p><p data-vmark="4f79">目前，TP-LINK 纸片路由共有 AX3000、 AX5400 和 AX6000 三种规格，售价分别为 329 元，499 元和 529 元。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%253dJF8BAN8JK1olXgILUllYDEITAF8IGloUXg4KXV9eC0MnRzBQRQQlBENHFRxWFlVPRjtUBABAQlRcCEBdCUoWAGcAEloWXg4dDRsBVXsfQDJPQAJdVWVqKjY_ahwXaDFUXzJDUQoyUV5YDksfBmcPK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFVWAtwAFkHUW5dCXtVbS1DWgZOHzYCV19fDksQA2cAK1sSWQ4AU19UAUwUB2c4G1MSbVpABh8fOHsnAF84K1slXjZcOl8OCEtCC2tcdQYSDUReCFhZZksQC2sLE1wVWDYAVV9fCnsn%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100029980229"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/82638/2/21562/251868/62d66dc0E52c86130/df500fc486280588.jpg" title="TP-LINK 推出新款纸片路由：AX6000 规格，售价 529 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> TP-LINK 纸片路由 AX6000 双频千兆 WiFi6 无线路由器</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 529 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
